<i class='icon-bullhorn'></i> Magics Ale.desc: The City of Barberton has begun using Nixle to provide community notifications. This service will help the City communicate electronically with the citizens in a timely manner. For more information and to sign up, please visit the community notifications page.

Exam Notice.desc:

Change for Change.desc:
This month's Change for Change we be held at Liedertafel (191 2nd St NW). Funds will be donated to the Salvation Army.
January 24, 4:30-7:00

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 4/.desc: City offices will be closed Friday, April 18 in observance of Good Friday

Magic Egg Hunt.desc:
The Magic Egg Hunt will be Saturday, April 19, 2013 at 11:00 am at Tuscora Park

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 5/.desc: City offices will be closed Monday, May 26 in observance of Memorial Day. Trash pickup will be delayed one day.

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 7/.desc: City offices will be closed Friday, July 4 in observance of Independence Day

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 9/.desc: City offices will be closed Monday, September 1 in observance of Labor Day. Trash pickup will be delayed one day.

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 11.desc: City offices will be closed Tuesday, November 11 in observance of Veterans' Day
City offices will be closed Thursday, November 27 and Friday, November 28 in observance of Thanksgiving

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 12.desc: City offices will be closed Wednesday, December 24 and Thursday, December 25 in observance of Christmas

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed 1/.desc: City offices will be closed Thursday, January 1 in observance of New Year's Day
